entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Int'l Airport 09:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: NNE 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle this morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016
